target.name: model-compile
target.description: compile models that need canonical processing

target.name: compile
target.depends: init, config-classpath, compile-with-modelgen, compile-standard, compile-jpa21-standard, compile-jpa22-standard, compile-springplatform, compile-criteria, compile-fullregression

target.name: package

fileset.includes: TestRunner1Bean.java TestRunner2Bean*.java TestRunner3Bean*.java TestRunner4Bean*.java TestRunner5Bean*.java TestRunner6Bean*.java

build-message.name: test.with.tenant.msg
build-message.else: * Runing tests on common application server

build-message.name: test.with.second.tenant.msg
build-message.value: * Runing two test suites on two WebLogic partitions in parallel

target.name: server-test-struct-converter

echo.message: Creating MY_GEOMETRY datatype for spatial tests: ${db.url}...

target.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE TYPE MY_GEOMETRY AS OBJECT (id NUMBER, geom MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY);
